body.name: Google Nest Mini 2nd Generation Smart Speaker with Google Assistant - Charcoal
features: VALUE BUNDLE INCLUDES: Google Nest Mini 2nd Generation Bluetooth Speaker with English, Spanish, French and Portuguese Global Language Compatibility so it works everywhere, Universal Power Adapter and Quick Start Guide English Quick Start Guide with International Manual for Global Users

IT WORKS EVERYWHERE Easy to use and will automatically start up in English when connecting to your device for the first time. This speaker works globally with support for most languages and places internationally. And its language settings can always be changed back and forth to your preferred language anytime for international use or travel at your convenience

BLENDS RIGHT INTO YOUR HOME Looks great on a nightstand, shelf, countertop - or the wall. This Nest Mini Speaker is small and mighty with bright sound that kicks! It plugs into the wall and is powered by the global ac adapter that works internationally so it works in outlets everywhere
body.description: BETTER SOUND ALL AROUND! Music sounds bigger and richer on Nest Mini 2nd Gen, now with even more power and bass! It blends right into your home and looks great on a nightstand, shelf, countertop - even on the wall. This Nest Mini Speaker is small and mighty with bold, punchy sound that kicks! It plugs into the wall and is powered by ac adapter that works globally so it works in outlets everywhere.Thoughtfully designed for every room. Nest Mini blends right into your home. It looks great on a nightstand, shelf, or countertop – even on the wall. Each color complements the entryway, living room, bedroom, or kitchen. Easy to use and will automatically start up in English when connecting to your device for the first time. This speaker works globally with support for most languages and places internationally. And its language settings can always be changed back and forth to your preferred language anytime for international use or travel at your convenience.EXCLUSIVE VALUE BUNDLE INCLUDES: Google Nest Mini 2nd Generation Bluetooth Speaker with English, Spanish, French and Portuguese Global Language Compatibility so it works everywhere, Universal Power Adapter and Quick Start Guide

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.8 3.8 out of 5 stars 201 ratings 3.8 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #727 in Electronics (See Top 100 in Electronics) #23 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and useful
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Always wanted my house to be more techy and honestly this was a good first step for me. I have so many lights around the house and its so easy to control through voice rather than switching it off one by one every morning/night. My favorite command is “okay google, good morning”. It gives me a run down of my calendar, weather, important news, and plays my spotify to help me get ready!Listens to my voice even if I’m talking on a moderately low volume.The only thing i hate about it is that it took up the entire 2 sockets because its rather large.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Second one, had to have it.
reviews.reviewText: Google Nest Mini is compact and powerful as an alternative to Alexa or HomePod. Great as a smart speaker for a small space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not new, not English-localized
reviews.reviewText: These are some sort of weird scam seller labeling these speakers as brand new when they’re refurbished. Sound quality is worse than the real deal, although likely that’s going to be inconsistent if these are actually refurbished and not just knockoffs. it does WORK, but clearly something is fishy about this seller. Do not recommend, just get it direct from Google.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great after setup
reviews.reviewText: The speaker does NOT come speaking English. I read many other reviews saying theirs had came in Spanish which would have been fine, but that was also not the case for me, mine was French. Luckily I have other speakers so set up wasn't to difficult. I love these speakers they make some things easier. Mine does make a weird sound as if you were trying to change the radio station on a satellite radio. Not sure if anyone else's is doing that or not. Makes me nervous. If it continues I will be sending it back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Functional - But comes with a Foreign plug and adapter. Will not work with wall mounts.
reviews.reviewText: Speaker works, but came with a Non-U.S. Plug (2 round prongs) and some sort of adapter to plug into the wall. Also came speaking French and was a pain to set up due to not being able to understand what It was saying.Will not work with the Google Nest mini wall mounts unless you purchase a regular U.S. Cord separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerfull mini speaker. Great, interactive Smart Device.
reviews.reviewText: I love it. I love the size of it and that it's portable. The speaker is small maybe the size of a hamburger...lol. The speakers have a crystal clear sound. It works with all the smart items in my new home. I enjoy how I can tell it to turn on and off the TV. It can make phone calls for you and put things on your shopping list in your phone. I can ask Google nest "what's the weather", how to spell a word, information about different subjects, do a math problem etc. I have advised all my friends to buy one.Truely an amazing piece of technology. Its a game changer to have around the home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Grandson’s google
reviews.reviewText: I gave this item as a gift to my Grandson and he loves it. A perfect gift for a 11 year old

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Comes in French with a Euro power adapter
reviews.reviewText: Was unable to get this to connect. The fact that it came in French language as a default just added to my frustration. I spent over 2 hours attempting to get this to connect to my internet and trying to get Google home to recognize the Nest Mini. I gave up and returned the item.Update.I stopped at a local department store, and purchased another Google Nest Mini (gen2). Brought it home and it connected in less than 15 minutes.
